title: Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, Black Dial Style: 98B406
descriptions:
**Introducing the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch: A Timepiece Fit for the Modern Man**

Elevate your style with this stunning gold-tone stainless steel chronograph watch, perfect for any occasion. The Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch is a masterpiece of precision and craftsmanship, boasting a black sunburst dial with gold-tone and silver-tone accents that exude sophistication.

**Key Features:**

* 6-hand chronograph and calendar functionality, allowing you to track your time and schedule with ease
* Black unidirectional timing bezel with gold-tone accents for added style and functionality
* Domed mineral crystal for maximum scratch resistance
* Water-resistant up to 100m, making it perfect for daily wear or water activities
* Hands and markers luminescent for clear visibility in low-light conditions

**Design and Construction:**

* Gold-tone stainless steel case and bracelet for a durable and stylish finish
* Curved and faceted links with sport foldover closure ensure a comfortable fit and secure fastening
* The watch's sleek design makes it suitable for both formal and casual occasions

**Unmatched Quality:**

* Bulova's reputation for producing high-quality timepieces is reflected in every detail of this watch, from the precision movement to the attention to craftsmanship
* With its 100m water resistance and durable construction, this watch is designed to withstand the demands of your active lifestyle

**Invest in Timeless Style:**

Don't settle for an ordinary watch. Upgrade to the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch, a true statement piece that exudes confidence and sophistication. Order now and experience the perfect blend of style, functionality, and precision engineering.

This 6-hand chronograph watch allows you to track your most important moments with precision. With its unidirectional timing bezel, you can easily measure elapsed time, making it perfect for athletes, adventurers, or anyone who needs a reliable timer by their side.

**Calendar Ready:**

Stay on top of your schedule with the calendar display feature that shows you the day and date at a glance. Whether you're planning a meeting or tracking your daily routine, this watch has got you covered.

**Water-Resistant and Durable:**

Don't worry about getting caught in unexpected rain showers or splashing around in the pool â€“ this watch is water-resistant up to 100 meters (10 ATM). The gold-tone stainless steel case and bracelet ensure that it remains durable and resistant to scratches and corrosion.

**Luminous Hands and Markers:**

In low-light conditions, the luminescent hands and markers on the dial will guide you through the night, ensuring that you can always keep track of time.

**Unique Design:**

The curved and faceted links on the gold-tone stainless steel bracelet add a touch of elegance to this sporty watch. The sport foldover closure ensures a secure fit, while the domed mineral crystal protects the dial from scratches.

**Upgrade Your Style:**

Whether you're dressing up for a night out or keeping it casual for everyday wear, this Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch is the perfect accessory to elevate your style and keep you on track. Get ready to make a statement with this exceptional timepiece!

**Order now and experience the precision, style, and durability of the Bulova Men's Marine Star Gold Chronograph Stainless Steel Watch!**
